participant_1.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i am a huge star wars fan. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry.

participant_2.background: i am a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you like to do for a living?
